content: Insurance Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked on 30 Jun 2019Is it fine to purchase insurance and savings plan separately from different insurance agents?1 answerAnswerBump0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 01 Jul 2019Yes it is, but your previous advisor should be made aware that you're purchasing a new policy if you're still in a working relationship.You can also buy from different insurance companies and even different countries.0 comments2
